moreQuestions.title: Still have questions?
moreQuestions.subtitle: Please describe your case to receive the most accurate advice.

pricing.question: What pricing plans are available?
pricing.answer: We offer three plans: Free, Basic, and Premium. Each plan varies in the range of features available.

pricing.question: What does the Free plan include?
pricing.answer: The Free plan gives access to the first chapter of each course, allowing you to test the material before purchasing.

pricing.question: What does the Basic plan offer?
pricing.answer: The Basic plan provides full access to the course and a certificate of completion. However, it does not include individual consultations with the instructor.

pricing.question: What does the Premium plan include?
pricing.answer:
The Premium plan offers full access to the course and additional features, such as:
- Certificate of completion
- Access to the group chat
- Access to individual chat with the instructor
- Live consultations with the instructor

pricing.question: Can I change my plan during the course?
pricing.answer: Yes, you can upgrade to a higher plan at any time by paying the price difference.

pricing.question: Can I cancel my Premium subscription?
pricing.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Course access will remain active until the end of the paid period.
